snippet: President-elect Trump has vowed to cancel the Paris climate accord, jeopardizing what scientists say is a critical 3.6-degree irreversible temperature target....
abstract: Donald Trump has named Myron Ebell to head his Environmental Protection Agency transition team, indication of Trump's plans for environmental policy, particularly with respect to global warming; Ebell is head of Competitive Enterprise Institutes and has downplayed risks of global warming; experts have warned that whatever progress Pres Obama has made in addressing climate change can easily be reversed by Trump.

byline.contributor: Justin Gillis contributed reporting from Christchurch, New Zealand, Vanessa Piao from Beijing, and Ellen Barry from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: President-elect Trump has vowed to cancel the Paris climate accord, jeopardizing what scientists say is a critical 3.6-degree irreversible temperature target.

headline.main: Donald Trump Could Put Climate Change on Course for ‘Danger Zone’
headline.print_headline: Climate Policy Faces Reversal by New Leader

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
